content: tail cast on method but you can use whichever method you prefer note 2 if you don t follow myinvisible join method use whatever method you prefer but make sure you have 116 stsfor round 1 round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * around round 2 *k2 p2 repeat from * around round 3 *k2 p2 repeat from * around round 4 *k2 p2 repeat from * around round 5 *k2 p2 repeat from * around round 6 *yo skp p2 repeat from * around repeatrounds 1-6 anadditional7 11 times for a total of 42 66 rounds final rounds 1-5 *k2 p2 repeat from * around you should have worked a total of 53 77 rounds for the entire cowl bind offall stitches note i recommend binding off in pattern as round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * around watch the tutorial in myfull pattern videoif you need help more free patterns ivy cardigan | glen echobaby blanket | kodiak cowl | havre cowl popular paid for patterns lofoten sweater | glymur socks | little thun baby sweater | vale beanie | banff cardigan 2021 ©the blue mouse cascadescowl |the blue mouse knits
